00023  /* chuncks of data which I will point the internal variables _nel_at and _nbasis_at and _basis_lbl_at too
00024    * this way I shall be able to deal with different basis sets
00025    */
00026 static void  parce_string (string line, string delims, vector<string>* result ) {
00027   string::size_type begIdx, endIdx;
00028 
00029   begIdx = line.find_first_not_of(delims);
00030   while (begIdx != string::npos) {
00031     endIdx = line.find_first_of (delims, begIdx);
00032     if (endIdx == string::npos) {
00033       endIdx = line.length();
00034     }
00035     result->push_back( line.substr(begIdx, endIdx-begIdx) );
00036     if (endIdx == line.length()) { break; cout << "I am still here";}
00037     begIdx = line.find_first_not_of (delims, endIdx);
00038   }
00039 }

00122 void basis_set::set_basis_set(const string & a){
00123     if ( a == "INDO" ){
00124         _nel_at      = INDO_nel_at;
00125         _nbasis_at   = INDO_nbasis_at;
00126         _basis_lbl_at= INDO_basis_lbl_at;
00127         cout << "INDO basis set will be used " << endl;
00128     }
00129     else if ( a == "STO" ){
00130         _nel_at      = STO_nel_at;
00131         _nbasis_at   = STO_nbasis_at;
00132         _basis_lbl_at= STO_basis_lbl_at;
00133     }
00134     else if ( a == "TZP" ){
00135         _nel_at      = TZP_nel_at;
00136         _nbasis_at   = TZP_nbasis_at;
00137         _basis_lbl_at= TZP_basis_lbl_at;
00138     }
00139     else {
00140         parse_xml_basisset_info(a);
00141     }
00142     basis_set_name = a;
00143 }

00172 
00173 void basis_set::parse_xml_basisset_info(const string & filename){
00174     load_property_from_xml(_options, filename.c_str());
00175     _nel_at = new int [55];
00176     _nbasis_at = new int [55];
00177     _basis_lbl_at = new string *[55];
00178     list<Property *> atoms = (_options.get("basis")).Select("ATOM");
00179     list<Property *>::iterator iter;
00180     for (iter = atoms.begin();iter != atoms.end(); ++iter){
00181         int lbl, nel,nbasis;
00182         vector <string> symms;
00183         lbl = (*iter)->get("label").as<int>();
00184         nel = (*iter)->get("nel").as<int>();
00185         nbasis = (*iter)->get("nbasis").as<int>();
00186         string s = (*iter)->get("basis_symm").as<string>();
00187         Tokenizer tok(s, "\n\t ");
00188         tok.ToVector(symms);
00189         _nel_at[lbl]=nel;
00190         _nbasis_at[lbl]=nbasis;
00191         _basis_lbl_at[lbl]= new string[nbasis];
00192         for (int i=0;i<nbasis;i++){
00193             _basis_lbl_at[lbl][i] = symms[i];
00194         }
00195     }
00196 }

00212             bnel = true;
00213         }

00222             Tokenizer tok(s, " \n\t");
00223             tok.ToVector(symms);
00224             bsymms = true;
00225         }
00226     }

00238 
00239 basis_set & basis_set::operator=(const basis_set a){
00240     _nel_at = new int[18];
00241     _nbasis_at = new int[18];
00242     _basis_lbl_at = new string *[18];
00243     for (int lbl=0; lbl<18;lbl++){
00244         _nel_at[lbl] = a._nel_at[lbl];
00245         int nbasis = a._nbasis_at[lbl];
00246         _nbasis_at[lbl] = nbasis;
00247         _basis_lbl_at[lbl]= new string[nbasis];
00248         for (int i=0;i<nbasis;i++){
00249             _basis_lbl_at[lbl][i] = a._basis_lbl_at[lbl][i];
00250         }
00251     } 
00252     return *this;
00253 
00254 }
00255 
00256 int basis_set::set_bs_prim( const char * name_basis_file ){
00257     ifstream in(name_basis_file);
00258     if (!in){
00259         cerr << "File: " << name_basis_file << " non existant." <<endl;
00260         return 1;
00261     }
00262     string basis_name;
00263     in >> basis_name; 
00264     set_basis_set(basis_name);
00265 
00266     /* start reading in the info on primitives etc */
00267         
00268     string line;
00269     string delims=" \t";
00270     vector <string> words;
00271     int atom_now=0;
00272     while (in){
00273         getline(in, line);
00274         words.clear();
00275         parce_string(line, delims, &words );
00276         if (words.size()==3){
00277                 int lbl_at = atoi(words[1].c_str());
00278                 int n_shells = atoi(words[2].c_str());
00279                 if (lbl_at < atom_now ) {
00280                     cerr << "File: " << name_basis_file << " not in correct format " <<endl;
00281                     return  2;
00282                 }
00283                 while ( lbl_at > atom_now ){
00284                         atom_shells empty;
00285                         empty.n_shells =0;
00286                         _atom_shells.push_back(empty);
00287                         atom_now++;
00288                 }
00289                 int count_shells = 0;
00290                 atom_shells full ;
00291                 full.n_shells = n_shells;
00292                 while ( true ) { // reading in the shells for atom whatever
00293                         getline(in, line);
00294                         words.clear();  
00295                         parce_string(line, delims, &words );
00296                         if (words.size() > 1 ) {   // readin in the specific shell for whatever
00297                                 count_shells = atoi(words[0].c_str()); // basically increment the counter (Im not chekcing)
00298                                 shell t_shell;
00299                                 t_shell._n_prim=0; // YES, its a  fuggin counter hence it start from uno
00300                                 if (words[1] == "s" ){
00301                                     t_shell._lambda = 0;
00302                                     t_shell._n_orbs = 1;
00303                                 }
00304                                 else if (words[1] == "p"){
00305                                     t_shell._lambda = 1;
00306                                     t_shell._n_orbs = 3;
00307                                 }
00308                                 else if (words[1] == "d"){
00309                                     t_shell._lambda = 2;
00310                                     t_shell._n_orbs = 6; // YES cartesian di functions: you got a problem wiht it punk?
00311                                 }
00312                                 else {
00313                                     cerr << words[1] << " problem readin goddamned line: " << line << "wtf: order the ouput! (or expand the code)"<<endl;
00314                                     return 3;
00315                                 }
00316                                 t_shell._n_prim++;
00317                                 t_shell._prim_exponent.push_back ( atof ( words[3].c_str() ) );
00318                                 t_shell._prim_contract.push_back ( atof ( words[4].c_str() ) );
00319                                 getline(in, line);
00320                                 words.clear();  
00321                                 parce_string(line, delims, &words );
00322                                 while ( words.size() > 1 ){
00323                                     t_shell._n_prim++;
00324                                     t_shell._prim_exponent.push_back ( atof ( words[3].c_str() ) );
00325                                     t_shell._prim_contract.push_back ( atof ( words[4].c_str() ) );
00326                                     getline(in, line);
00327                                     words.clear();      
00328                                     parce_string(line, delims, &words );
00329                                 }
00330                                 full._shells.push_back(t_shell);
00331                                 if (count_shells == n_shells ) break;
00332                         }
00333 
00334                 }
00335                 _atom_shells.push_back(full);
00336                 atom_now++;
00337         }
00338     }
00339     return 0;
00340 }

00342 
00343 void basis_set::print_all_primitive_info(ostream &out){
00344     for ( int j =0 ; j< _atom_shells.size(); ++j){
00345                 
00346                 for (int k=0; k< _atom_shells[j].n_shells;++k){
00347                     out << "Doing atom: " << j << " and shell: " << k <<endl;
00348                     out << _atom_shells[j]._shells[k]._n_orbs << endl;
00349                     out << _atom_shells[j]._shells[k]._lambda << endl;
00350                     out << _atom_shells[j]._shells[k]._n_prim << endl;
00351                     out << _atom_shells[j]._shells[k]._prim_exponent.size() <<endl;
00352                     out << _atom_shells[j]._shells[k]._prim_contract.size() <<endl;
00353                     for (int i=0; i<_atom_shells[j]._shells[k]._n_prim;++i){
00354                             out << _atom_shells[j]._shells[k]._prim_exponent[i] << endl;
00355                             out << _atom_shells[j]._shells[k]._prim_contract[i] << endl;
00356                     }
00357                 }
00358         }
00359 }
